avdta.vehicle.route

Interface RouteChoice

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FixedPath

    public interface RouteChoice
    This class represents a route choice behavior for a single vehicle. Each vehicle should have its own instance of RouteChoice, which is separate from the Path followed. For following a fixed path, see the FixedPath class. However, other implementations are possible as well.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void enteredLink(Link l)
      Called when the associated Vehicle enters the given Link.
      void exited()
      Called when the associated Vehicle exits the network.
      Node getDest()
      Returns the destination Node.
      double getLength()
      Returns the total length of the links traversed.
      Link getNextLink(Link curr)
      Returns the next Link the Vehicle should take.
      Node getOrigin()
      Returns the origin Node.
      Path getPath()
      Returns the path that was traversed.
      void reset()
      Called to reset this RouteChoice for a new simulation.

    • Method Detail

      • getLength

        double getLength()
        Returns the total length of the links traversed.
        Returns:
        the length traversed (mi)

      • getPath

        Path getPath()
        Returns the path that was traversed. If the route choice is not fixed, the path traversed should be stored for postprocessing.
        Returns:
        the path that was traversed

      • enteredLink

        Called when the associated Vehicle enters the given Link.
        Parameters:
        l - the Link entered

      • exited

        Called when the associated Vehicle exits the network.

      • reset

        void reset()
        Called to reset this RouteChoice for a new simulation.

        Returns the next Link the Vehicle should take.
        Parameters:
